tasks.task_description: Replace confusing grid-based timezone comparison with a cleaner vertical list
Add visual indicators for selected timezone
Improve spacing and readability of timezone display

description: Improve timezone comparison UI in settings page
context: Successfully replaced the confusing grid-based timezone comparison with a cleaner vertical list format. Added visual indicators (colored dot) for the selected timezone, improved spacing with proper padding, and made the text more readable with better contrast and font weights. The selected timezone now shows as "Votre fuseau horaire" with primary color highlighting.

Development server is running on port 3001. The timezone comparison UI improvements are complete and ready for testing. The new vertical list format with visual indicators and better spacing should be much more intuitive than the previous grid layout.
